data.name: Fight of Animals: Original Sound Tracks Collection
data.detailed_description:
Digital Crafter has work with talent music composer Shang Feng Yang from TPOP Studio once again!

Fight of Animals: Original Sound Tracks Collection include 9 tracks from the whole Fight of Animals series.
Hope you guys like it!! Don't miss it
